content: learn how to create casper the dog amigurumi with this free dog crochet pattern this is an easy to crochet pattern perfect for beginners it is also very quick to make takes just a few hours you can use any yarn to make it i made a small dog from sport weight cotton yarn and a bigger dog from chenille super bulky plush yarn the pattern has a full video included on how to make this cute dog amigurumi link to written pattern https //www mariskavos nl/free-dog-crochet-pattern/ link to video https //youtu be/0tlre1fdlfy
